name: Bookbot-VirtualBookmarkandProgressTracker
0:
”Alexa, open Book bot and tell me how many pages I read”
”Alexa, open Book bot and add Big Chungus to my library”
”Alexa, ask Book bot what page am i on”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: book bot
des:
Bookbot helps you keep track of the progress of your literary adventures in a straight-forward and easy way! To start, just say "Alexa, open bookbot" and Bookbot will walk you through adding books into your digital collection. 

Bookbot can keep track of multiple books and even tell you what book you are currently reading. This skill includes shortcut commands for pro users to quickly add and remove books from your library by keeping track of what book you are currently reading. 

Use Cases:
Bookbot will automatically set your current book to whichever book you changed last.
To get the page of your current book, say, "Get current book page".
To get the page of a different book, say, "Get book page".
To get your pages read count, ask, "How many pages did I read".
To get your current book, ask, "What is my current book?".

To update the page of your current book, you can say, "Update current book page".
To change the page of a book other than your current, say, "Change book page".
To change your current book, say, "Change current book".

To reset your library, say, "Reset my library".
To reset your pages read, say, "Reset pages read".

Phrases:
- Alexa, open Bookbot
- Alexa, add book
- Alexa, what is my current book?
- Alexa, change my current book
- Alexa, what page am I on?
- Alexa, change my current page
- Alexa, add Adventures of Big Chungus to my library
- Alexa, what page am I on in Diary of a Yobama
- Alexa, list my books
- Alexa, remove book

Updates:
- Now includes current book functionality
* Update your bookmark right when you open the skill!

Notice:
IF THIS APP DOES NOT MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS or if you want someone to talk to :), ROAST ME AT 2XNOOT@GMAIL.COM.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
